body_html: I'm not familiar with tensorflow codes, but I tried to trace this. Looks like if we can't assign the exact thread in thread pool to run for each input element, we can't make sure the parallel map functions with random ops are deterministic. However, assigning thread sounds counterintuitive to the nature of thread pool.
